name: nzb-dav
description: NZBDav adds WebDAV access to your NZB download folder. It acts as a bridge making downloads accessible via WebDAV clients or cloud sync services like Nextcloud or rClone, ideal in self-hosted media stacks.
features: WebDAV bridge: Expose NZB download folders via WebDAV protocol for universal access.
Cloud sync integration: Connect with Nextcloud, ownCloud, or rClone for automatic syncing.
File access: Browse and download completed NZB files from any WebDAV-compatible client.
Cross-platform support: Access downloads from Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, and Android.
Media stack integration: Seamlessly integrate with Sonarr, Radarr, and other automation tools.
Read-only mode: Prevent accidental deletion or modification of download files.
Authentication: Secure access with username and password protection.
Path mapping: Configure custom paths and folder structures for organized access.
Lightweight proxy: Minimal overhead for bridging local storage to WebDAV protocol.
Docker deployment: Easy containerized setup for integration with existing media stacks.
No file duplication: Direct access to download folder without copying or moving files.
Real-time updates: See new downloads immediately as they complete without manual refresh.
